title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: A Mixed-Methods Study for Improving Pedagogical Awareness in PowerPoint Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain design principles to reduce cognitive overload by optimizing information density in PowerPoint slides.
Learners can implement project deliverables using visual elements to convey concepts, moving beyond text-dependent lectures.
Learners can apply mixed research methods to analyze instructional effectiveness using quantitative surveys (5-point Likert scale) and qualitative interview techniques.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
